title: Georgia’s Midnight Mission
description:
Georgia Berkovich didn't think she’d make it out of her 20’s. Hooked on drugs and destitute, she finally got clean. Then she started giving back and re-discovered her zest for life. Georgia now leads a volunteer program that’s bringing hope to countless lives in Los Angeles.

Learn more about The Midnight Mission
